Share: Digg Facebook StumbleUpon Part 4: "Peculiar Phenomena," V-2 Rockets - and UFOB Retaliation? © 2004 by Linda Moulton Howe Return to Part 1 December 10, 2004 Albuquerque, New Mexico - Interplanetary Phenomenon Unit One of the many important documents gathered by Bob and Ryan Wood and displayed for study at their website, www.majestic12documents.com, is entitled: TOP SECRET ULTRA INTERPLANETARY PHENOMENON UNIT SUMMARY INTELLIGENCE ASSESSMENT File Ref. 001947122-A.1206. This IPU document states: "The extraordinary recovery of fallen airborne objects in the state of New Mexico, between 4 July - 6 July 1947: This Summary was prepared by Headquarters Interplanetary Phenomenon Unit, Scientific and Technical Branch, Counterintelligence Directorate, as requested by A. C. of S., G-2, at the expressed order of Chief of Staff." TOP SECRET ULTRA Interplanetary Phenomenon Unit Summary, re-classified above TOP SECRET on a Need To Know basis and approved on September 4, 1960, by NSA Director, Lt. General John A. Samford, and CIA Director, Allen Dulles. The IPU Intelligence Assessment was re-classified on September 4, 1960, as "affecting the national security and has been upgraded as above TOP SECRET with a "Need to Know" basis. Only those authorized persons with MAJIC access may have access. Upgrading schedule to commence only with an approved presidential Executive Order with approval of U. S. Majestic Intelligence and Security." This reclassification was done by the authority of Lt. General John A. Samford, Director, National Security Agency, and approved by Allen Dulles, Director of the Central Intelligence Agency and stamped TOP SECRET ULTRA.

Upgraded classification approved by Allen Dulles, Director, CIA, and by authority of Lt. General John A. Samford, Director, NSA. Three Disc Crash Retrievals Between July 4-6, 1947 On Page 6 of the document, five alien bodies are described as they were found with a crashed aerial vehicle at a site on the northern end of the White Sands Missile Range in July 1947. The site is called LZ-2 in the report, which means, "Landing Zone 2" on White Sands territory between the Trinity Site and Oscura Peak. Landing Zone 1 is defined as the crash site between Corona and Roswell. A third Landing Zone 3 is defined as 30 miles east of Alamogordo near the Mescalero Apache Indian Reservation. All three crashes occurred between July 4 and July 6, 1947, according to the MJ-12 report. IPU document describes three UFO crash/retrieval sites referred to as LZ (Landing Zone) 1, 2 and 3, occurring between July 4 and 6, 1947. Approximate locations are shown on this map. On Page 2, Paragraph 4, the IPU Intelligence Assessment states: "On arrival at LZ-2, personnel assessed the finds as not belonging to any aircraft, rocket, weapons, or balloon test that are normally conducted from surrounding bases. First reports indicated that the first crash investigators from Roswell AAF that LZ-1 was the remains of an AAF top secret MOGUL balloon project. When scientists from the Los Alamos Scientific Laboratory arrived to inspect LZ-2, it became apparent to all concerned that what had crashed in the desert was something out of this world. IPU Intelligence Assessment, Page 2, Paragraph 4. Description of Humanoid Bodies Recovered

at LZ-2, White Sands Proving Ground Further along in the IPU Intelligence Assessment, Paragraph 11 states: "as to the bodies recovered at LZ-2, it appeared that none of the five crew members survived entry into our atmosphere due to unknown causes. DR. DETLEV BRONK has been asked to assist in the autopsy of one well preserved cadaver to be done by MAJOR CHARLES REA. From what descriptions the team was able to learn and from photographs taken by intelligence photographers, the occupants appear in most respects human with some anatomical differences in the head, eyes, hands and feet. They have a slight build about five feet tall, with grayish-pink skin color. They have no hair on their bodies and clothed with a tight fitting flight suit that appears to be fire proof (some of the bodies looked as if they had been burned on head and hands). Their overall stature reminds one of young children. It is believed that there were male and female genders present, but was hard to distinguish. IPU Intelligence Assessment, Paragraph 11. "Bodies Disected (sic) As You Would A Frog" "The most disturbing aspect of this investigation was that there were other bodies found not far from Landing Zone 1 (the Mac Brazel site between Corona and Roswell) that looked as if they had been disected (misspelled in report) as you would a frog. It is not known if Army field surgeons had performed exploratory surgery on these bodies. Animal parts were reportedly discovered inside the craft at Landing Zone 2 (White Sands Missile Range site) , but this cannot be confirmed. The team has reserved judgement on this issue." IPU Intelligence Assessment, Paragraph 12. It is not known what type of dissected bodies are referred - human? animal? non-human? Apparently those "disected (sic) bodies" were found on the ground "not far from Landing Zone-1" at the Corona site. But whatever the dissected bodies were, in addition to the discovery of animal parts inside the craft at the White Sands Landing Zone-2, that disturbing physical evidence must have scared President Truman and his colleagues so badly that they all agreed a tight lid must be placed on UFOs. A policy of complete denial in the interest of national security was demanded while the President and his advisers tried to learn more and figure out what they were up against. Thus, the National Security Act of 1947 created the Central Intelligence Agency, the Majestic-12 Special Studies Group and presidential executive orders that required everyone associated with the extraterrestrial investigation to deliberately lie to and misinform the press and the public in order to prevent panic and sustain national security. Majestic 12 Project 1st Annual Report, 1952 In addition to the dissected humanoids and animal parts, there was another disturbing event that would also have provoked the Truman Administration's decision to keep all the

real facts about UFOs and what was in them from the press and public. In the year 1952, Truman's Majestic-12 Special Studies Group issued its first annual report as "A Review of the President's Special Panel to Investigate the Capture of Unidentified Planform Space Vehicles by U. S. Armed Forces and Agencies." ( Planform was a word used back then to describe flatter, curved surfaces.) TOP SECRET MAJIC "Majestic Twelve Project, 1st Annual Report, 1952. Retroviruses: Biological Warfare On Page 5 of the TOP SECRET MJ-12 report under a paragraph entitled "Biological Warfare Programs," it states: "Biological Warfare programs in the U.S. and U. K. are in field test states. Discovery of new virus and bacteria agents so lethal that serums derived by genetic research can launch medical science into unheard of fields of biology. The samples extracted from bodies found in New Mexico have yielded new strains of a retro-virus not totally understood, but give promise of the ultimate biological warfare weapon. The danger lies in the spread of airborne and bloodborne outbreaks of disease in large populations with no medical cures available." Majestic Twelve Project, 1st Annual Report, 1952, Page 5, Paragraph F. Retro-viruses was not even a common medical concept in 1947. Examples of retroviruses are HIV, leukemia and the deadly Ebola virus that causes its victims to hemorrhage blood from every orifice. Retro-viruses are composed only of RNA which can end up getting healthy DNA to incorporate the insidious RNA instructions into the genome of the cells, which then destroy. Editor's Note: Retro-virus - 1) A member of a class of RNA viruses that utilizes the enzyme reverse transcriptase to reverse copy its genome into a DNA intermediate, which integrates into the host cell chromosome. Many naturally occurring cancers of vertebrate animals are caused by retroviruses. 2) Any virus in the family Retroviridae that has RNA as its nucleic acid and uses the enzyme reverse transcriptase to copy its genome into the DNA of the host cell's chromosomes. 3) Any of a group of viruses that contain two single- strand linear RNA molecules per virion and reverse transcriptase (RNA to DNA). "Alien Virus:" Four Los Alamos SED Security Men Died Hemorrhaging and in Seizures On Page 9, ANNEX A, Paragraphs 8 and 9 of the TOP SECRET MJ-12 1st Annual Report it states: "8. The Panel was concerned over the contamination of several SED personnel upon coming in contact with debris near the power plant of the craft security. (That SED security detachment was from the 509th Composite Group based at Los Alamos with the Manhattan Project. You can read about them at the website:

www.childrenofthemanhattanproject.org.) One technician was overcome and collapsed when he attempted the removal of a body. Another medical technician went into a coma only four hours after placing a body in a rubber body-bag. All four men were rushed to Los Alamos for observation. All four later died of seizures and profuse bleeding. All four were wearing protective suits when they came in contact with body fluids from the occupants. "9. Autopsies on the four dead SED technicians are not conclusive. It is believed that the four may have suffered from some form of toxin or a highly contagious disease. Tissue samples are currently being kept at Fort Detrick, Maryland. Majestic Twelve Project, 1st Annual Report, 1952, Page 9, Paragraphs 8 and 9. "13. In the opinion of the senior Atomic Energy Commission medical officer, current medical equipment and supplies are wholly inadequate in dealing with a large scale outbreak of the alien virus." Majestic Twelve Project, 1st Annual Report, 1952, Page 9, Paragraph 13. Neutron Radiation "10. The Panel was also concerned with the detection of air-borne release of radiation over the state of New Mexico. AFTAC detachment from McClellan AFB has conducted several airborne monitor flights over Site L-2. Radiation readings indicate a high neutron count was recorded as the plane flew over the site. Neutron count dropped off as the plane flew a considerable distance from the site. A report has been filed with the USAIDS." Editor's Note: AFTAC = Air Force Technical Applications Center based in 1947 at McClellan AFB, moved to the 45th Space Wing, Patrick AFB, Cape Canaveral region, Florida at Space Port Customers. Las Cruces Sun-News, May 20, 1947, Las Cruces, New Mexico. Painful Retaliation? In summary, it would seem that compartmentalized Need To Know insiders of the U. S. government have been running scared since at least 1947 and trying to keep any signs of their fear and lack of control from the press and public. There was the "peculiar phenomena" that Col. Turner mentioned in 1947 at White Sands that could simply appear in flight along side Top Secret V-2 launched rockets and apparently cause the V-2 rockets to change course. Then when the government allegedly used weapons to forcefully bring some of the "peculiar phenomena" down to Earth, human airplanes seemed to crash at an alarming rate between early May and end of July 1947, provoking President Truman to call for a special investigation of the aviation crisis. Former New Mexico State Representative Andrew Kissner thinks many of those airplane crashes were retaliation for U. S. aggression against the foreign discs. Perhaps the "peculiar phenomena" was here or still is here only to monitor Earth for

whatever reason and has never intended harm until threatened by human military aggression. But then there were the dissected bodies - including animals - referenced in the government's own highly classified Interplanetary Unit and Majestic 12 reports. Plus, the hemorrhaging deaths of security men who handled crash site bodies. The animal mutilations are famous for being bloodless, without tracks, associated with mysterious lights and beams, and continue worldwide to date. And what about all those human abduction complaints since the 1960s, also associated with mysterious lights and beams? Col. Turner's "peculiar phenomena" have continued into the 21st Century. But someone seems to have stopped disks crashing. Did the "peculiar phenomena" change? Or did we because payback was too painful?
